definition: to give as a present/to repel/to bestow an honorary title after death (old)
to deliver/to carry/to give (as a present)/to present (with)/to see off/to send

sentences.english: B. His long service with the company was acknowledged with a present.
sentences.chinese: 向他贈送禮品以感謝他長期來對公司的服務。

sentences.english: One free draft beer for purchasing draft beer at Lunch time in De Bistro .
sentences.chinese: 會員在西餐廳享用午餐時，買扎啤可免費贈送一杯。

sentences.english: This barbecued chicken is on the house.
sentences.chinese: 這燒烤雞是餐廳免費贈送的。

sentences.english: Lavish gifts were bestowed on the visitors.
The boss presented a bus-shelter to the village .
sentences.chinese: 這位老闆贈送一座公共汽車車亭給村莊。

sentences.english: Give organic chocolate is another environmental-friendly choice.
sentences.chinese: 贈送有機巧克力也是一個環保的選擇。

sentences.english: Presented by the Chinese American veterans of the 14th Air Force.
sentences.chinese: 由第14航空隊的中美老兵贈送。

sentences.english: To be familiar with hotel collateral and give-away.
sentences.chinese: 熟悉飯店的宣傳資料及贈送的禮品。

sentences.english: Whoso boasteth himself of a false gift is like clouds and wind without rain.
sentences.chinese: 空誇贈送禮物的，好像無雨的風雲。

sentences.english: The gifts; there are three gifts: gold,frankincense and myrrh.
sentences.chinese: 他們贈送給耶穌黃金，乳香和沒藥。

sentences.english: At the end of the performance, the two prime ministers presented flower baskets to extend congratulations.
sentences.chinese: 演出結束後，兩國總理贈送花籃，祝賀演出成功。

sentences.english: If you buy a refrigerator, we will throw in a microwave oven.
sentences.chinese: 如果你買一臺電冰箱，我們免費贈送一臺微波爐。

sentences.english: There’s nothing wrong with giving away a free resource in exchange for someone’s email address.
sentences.chinese: 贈送免費資源交換某人的郵件地址是無可厚非了。

sentences.english: Once you’ve built up a stack, separate them into little piles according to who gave them to you.
sentences.chinese: 當你的卡片已經蓋成高塔，把它們按贈送者分開。

sentences.english: A full set of genuine software is presented and you can select different types of laser and chiller power.
sentences.chinese: 贈送全套正版軟件，可選配不同功率激光器和冷水機。

definition: to give as a present/to repel/to bestow an honorary title after death (old)
to send/to give as a present
to belong or be dedicated exclusively to/proprietary/private/personal
